thread.title: There's a Lot in a Name
thread.title_full: There's a Lot in a Name

title: There's a Lot in a Name
text:
Email 0 
Some film names go on to stick, no matter the length of time. Bobby Simha, who played the villain ‘Assault Sethu’ in Jigarthanda, has taken it one step further. Starting a production house recently, he has named it Assault Productions. Vallavanukku Vallavan is the first offering under this banner and it stars Bobby in the lead. He means business. comments powered by Disqus
